home.description: Fullstack developer. Since I found my passion for finding solutions to logical problems in 2017, I haven't stopped programming. And today I invite you to contact me if you are interested in what I do.

experience.title: Experience
experience.stellavogue: Stella Vogue is a prototype women's clothing store showcasing a selection of trendy and stylish fashion pieces, designed to offer confidence and elegance.
experience.textCipher: a didactic tool to learn a little about encryption and decryption algorithms such as "aes", "pbkdf2", "rabbit", among others.
experience.eliasBlog: A personal space to share ideas, learnings, and questions about life and creativity. A digital corner to explore and connect through words.

aboutMe.title: More about me
aboutMe.description0: I love tackling complex challenges and finding creative solutions to technical problems. I am a firm believer in continuous learning and am always looking for opportunities to improve my skills and keep up to date with the latest trends in technology.
aboutMe.description1: Outside of the development world, I enjoy exploring new experiences, reading about philosophy, classic novels, and spending time outdoors enjoying nature. I am excited about future opportunities to collaborate on exciting projects and continue to grow as a professional in the field of web development.

contactMe.title: Contact me
contactMe.description: If you are intrested in hiring me, call me, email me or connect and chat with me via LinkedIn!
